June 6,1955
Segreteria General© "Prix Italia"*,

Dear Sir:
We have requested the Chase National Bank of New York
to forward to you 1,588 Swiss francs, these to be placed
to your credit at the Banca Nazlonale Del Lavoro-F11iale
di Horn©*
This is the contribution of the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters to the Prix Italia for 1955*
We are pleased to send our contribution and vie appreciate
the opportunity for the National Association of Educational
Bro'deesters to participate in the Prix Italia activity.
Very cordially yours,
R.J.Coleman, Treasurer
